articles.summary: The family of a 70-year-old man who died in Indore while undergoing treatment in a hospital has linked his demise to the water contamination tragedy in Bhagirathpura, though a senior health official on Friday (February 6, 2026) said the deceased had a history of paralysis and had also suffered a thigh bone fracture.
